text: The African-American LGBT community, otherwise referred to as the Black LGBT community, is part of the overall LGBT culture and overall African-American culture. LGBT African Americans experience discrimination from both their race and sexuality/LGBT background.2020 Survey Results Highlight Disparities in the Workplace, in Police Interactions, and in Mental and Physical Health African Americans are more likely to identify as lesbian, gay, bisexual, or transgender than any other racial and ethnic group in the country. 1.2 million blacks belong to the LGBT community. ==References== Category:LGBT African- Americans
title: African-American LGBT community
